short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick bookmark creation and tab discarding. One click downloads n stuff. IDK.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Suspends all tabs on browser startup to improve performance.
Allows you to bookmark and close the tabs you want in two simple clicks.
Adds the button for quick file/link download without showing you the "save as" prompt.
